name: Cora and the Coven of the Beating Hearth - prototype
name_original: Cora and the Coven of the Beating Hearth - prototype
description:
Cora ventures into the evil witch lair in order to save her sister.

This is a prototype of a game idea combining a fixed camera that goes from side scroller to 3rd person and platforming.
